item.description:
UMass Amherst Innovation & Entrepreneurship Day: Translational Biomedical Opportunities for Campus, Company & Clinical Collaborations
When: Friday, March 4 from 8:30 a.m. to 4:15 p.m.
Where: Massachusetts Room, Mullins Center, UMass Amherst
Website: http://www.umass.edu/...
This one-day program is for company, clinical and academic researchers and entrepreneurs. Speakers will offer information about programs and resources of the Massachusetts Life Sciences Center, federal agencies, the UMass Center for Clinical & Translational Science, UMass Amherst and others that can help translate biomedical research into products and practice. In addition, participants will be introduced to technologies with translational potential and opportunities for collaboration. Company, clinical and academic researchers, as well as entrepreneurs, are invited to propose five-minute presentations (three slides) to highlight technology with translational potential and describe opportunities for collaboration.
item.name: UMass Amherst Innovation & Entrepreneurship Day
